Name: Bear Adventures
About the game: Bear Adventures is a 3D platformer with unique graphics! You can play alone or invite your friends, because in Bear Adventures the co-op mode of the game supports up to 4 players !! About the game You are a bear! Weird bear beekeeper! Your enemies have decided to destroy your honey empire! Go on a journey to bring back honey and punish them! You have to overcome all the trials and return the stolen honey in order to restore their production. Don't relax! Attack enemies and collect honey along the way with your friends! -attack with a blow 'Pinwheel' -cut down trees -Kill animals -Pass levels against the clock, and set your records. Peculiarities Unique graphics Many traps Interesting levels Level in complete darkness where: the only source of light is a torch, but it does not shine for long, you need to overcome obstacles on the level, find the next torch to reach the finish line.
